author: skitching
msg: Rework way conversation objects are instantiated. Only the original Scope object has
the necessary data to configure the ConversationAspects correctly, so define a
ConversationFactory interface and make the Scope class implement it. Aspects can then
simply be created directly rather than via a list of template classes.

author: seelmann
msg: Renamed some members and methods, added Javadoc

author: manjula
msg: Code cleaning and Improved error handling.

author: gshimansky
msg: Removed DOS line endings from Apache header
